name: Hue and Cry Photoshop Plug-in
summary: An SA9 file is a plugin used by Adobe Photoshop and compatible image editors. It contains the compiled code and resources that make up the Hue and Cry plugin, which includes the instructions the software uses to generate the abstract color regions, along with any built-in parameters or presets needed for the effect. SA9 files are part of Hue and Cry, a plugin developed by Flaming Pear Software that generates abstract regions of color within an image.
